mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.PoliticalHierarchyLengthException
mdException.label: Political Hierarchy Length Exception
mdException.description: The political hierarchy is longer than the number of allocated spots for the geo entity attribute.

integer.name: slots
integer.label: Slots
integer.description: The number of allocated spots for a geo entity attribute
